page.title: 06GUITING POWER.POLICE STATION
page.content: We have a police-station in the village, and the policeman is a member of the Gloucestershire Police Force. He visits the school and talks about road safety,and helps train cyclists for their National Cycling Proficiency Badges. His helmet is made of cork and fibre glass.He wears his army medals on important occasions because he was in the army before he became a policeman seven years ago. The equipment that a policeman carries includes staff,notebook,pen, watch,handcuffs and whistle. In big cities they carry guns. He also has a radio which is tuned to police frequency. The nearest dog-handling squad is in Cheltenham.
